name: Space Rogue (itch) (Mia Bentzen)
description:
Command your space ship as you fly through space, kill enemies, and upgrade your ship, but if you die you start over!

Features

  • Replayable roguelike gameplay
  • Customize your ship with a variety of weapons and upgrade modules
  • An intense and aggressive synthwave soundtrack

Credits

Programming, Music, Art, etc - Mia Bentzen

Unreal Engine 4 - Epic Games

(Note: This game is early access, and i don't know how far i'll take it before i'll call it done)
